author: gary sarkisian
comment: I can control the cursor and the arrow buttons actually have the same effect as a swipe on the screen, but tap doesn't work and tap and drag doesn't work either.
title: Does this work on anyone's oneplus one?

author: Matt Mickool
comment: I am able to get it to connect to my phone; however, single touches and drag and drop don't work.  Please fix.
title: Does not work...

author: Charlie Turpin
comment: This app has majore potential. But it doesn't work. Whenever I open it up on my moto 360 it crashes the phone side of it. I forgot to say that I don't have root. That's probably why it won't work
title: Doesn't work

author: Stylus Max
comment: Simple and does as its intended to. Here's hoping for an update with a better looking cursor though. Possibly the traditional mouse look or something.

reply.author: tkgktyk
reply.content: Thank you for feedback, it's interesting. It is great if there are more builtin cursor images and cursor image picker feature. I examine method for images.

title: Works great

author: Cedric Vallieu
comment: Good start. Pretty laggy cursor movement on nexus 5x and Huawei watch, it's not that bad very useful but can be better. Im confused is the arrows to click? When I try to tap in the middle of the pad I can only get the cursor to move but not to open apps and such.
